projects.title: These are some of my projects

card_1.title: Brief story
card_1.content: After learning a lot about how the Internet has evolved, in 2015 I decided to create my first website. From there I learned a lot about computer science. What motivated me to continue learning more in other fields such as design, artificial intelligence, music or algorithms.

card_2.title: Today
card_2.content: So I became a self-taught developer. A big fan of learning about any technology. And apply it to innovation projects, scientific research or social aid. And also teach how to use it.

card_3.title: Más datos
content: I am currently studying at the SENATI technology institute.
I teach computer science on YouTube.
